recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Heat the olive oil in a pan and sauté the chopped onion and garlic until translucent.
Add the minced beef and cook until browned.
Add the canned tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti.

comments.message: Loved it! My family enjoyed it.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cut the chicken breast into bite-sized pieces.
Heat the vegetable oil in a pan and sauté the chopped onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add the chicken pieces and cook until browned.
Add the curry powder and cook for another minute.
Pour in the coconut milk, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 15-20 minutes.

comments.message: Loved it! My family enjoyed it.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Chop all the vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat the sesame oil in a pan and sauté the chopped onion and garlic until translucent.
Add the bell pepper, carrot, and broccoli. Stir fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add the soy sauce, salt, and pepper. Cook for another 2 minutes.

comments.message: Loved it! My family enjoyed it.
